about_the_game:
Dead Wolf - fear is just the beginning ... It is 2029…. In a secret science lab, the well-known scientist Teodor Sorokin created the lethal weapon and used it to the destroy humanity. Just few people survive hiding themselves underground. One of them is Mark Sorokin, son of a scientist. Mark decides to return to the surface of the earth to find the source of a deadly virus.



"Dead Wolf" is a psychological thiller that introduces players into the world of paralyzing fear, vision of the end of the world and desperate will to survive. The dynamics of events, dark secrets, surprising plot and remarkable graphics, all this creates the reality of "Dead Wolf".

"Dead Wolf" is a psychological thiller that introduces players into the world of paralyzing fear, vision of the end of the world and desperate will to survive. The dynamics of events, dark secrets, surprising plot and remarkable graphics, all this creates the reality of "Dead Wolf".

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12.x / macOS Ventura 13.0
  • Processor: Devices with Apple silicon
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12.x / macOS Ventura 13.0
  • Processor: Devices with Apple silicon
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Dead Wolf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 with support for DirectX 12 Agility SDK
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690/ AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB/ AMD RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB dostępnej przestrzeni GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 with support for DirectX 12 Agility SDK
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700K/ AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB dostępnej przestrzeni GB available space

short_description: „Dead Wolf” is a psychological thiller that introduces players into the world of paralyzing fear, vision of the end of the world and desperate will to survive.
